text:
Two girls, aged eight and seven, drowned in Velam lake in Melvelam village near Ranipet on Sunday.

Police said Preethi (8) and Sneha (7) had drowned in the lake when they had gone to bathe in it along with their friends. Villagers recovered their bodies and informed the police. Ranipet police have registered a case. - Staff Reporter
title: Two girls drown in lake
